# Effects of thermal drift on position


## The quasi-static ideal equation


- The fundamental equation for tip-distance d 


zc: cantilever separation


z: Tip deflection


d: tip sample distance



<font size="12">

<center>d=z_c + z</center>

</font>


## Effects of drift velocity | No z_c drift: the ideal case

## Effects of drift velocity | the z_c drift!


- There is an effective value of z_c

This is because of drift in z_c
